children.name: E_SPAWN_OFFSET_X
children.comment: How far the enemy spawn from the screen borders

children.name: E_SPAWN_OFFSET_Y
children.comment: How far the enemy can spawn from the player

children.name: E_SPAWN_MIN_Y
children.comment: Minimum Y valid as a spawn position

children.name: E_SPAWN_MAX_Y
children.comment: Maximum Y valid as a spawn position

children.name: E_SPAWN_NO_RECON
children.comment: Minimum Y for Drone if player does not have Recon

children.name: E_SPAWN_BASE_TIME
children.comment: Maximum time taken to spawn a new enemy of a given type

children.name: E_SPAWN_DEC_TIME
children.comment: Spawn time reduction for every level of a given enemy

children.text: Destroy enemies that crossed the whole screen.
Push enemies outside other enemies on spawn.

actions.text: Move the boss and restart random movement timer.

children.text: If an entry for that explosive already exists, update its value.
Otherwise, create it and set its value to 1 (initial bounce off that explosive).

actions.text: Create obstacle and set its properties.
Create the bomb and set its properties.

parameters.y:
random(
    eLevelRecon > 0 ? max(Player.Y - E_SPAWN_OFFSET_Y, E_SPAWN_MIN_Y) : E_SPAWN_NO_RECON,
    E_SPAWN_MAX_Y
)

actions.text: Create the bomb and set its properties.
Create abductor and add it as a child of Saucer.

children.text: When a saucer is destroyed, destroy its abductor with an animation.
